document_data.name: Ogre Magi
document_data.mainbody: '''Ogre Magi''' was the racial language of [[ogre mage]]s.{{Cite organized play/LC/Twilight of the Dirty Turtles|8}}
document_data.Speakers: Beyond ogre mages themselves, Ogre Magi was the primary language spoken by [[ogre]]s throughout [[Kara-Tur]] and in the [[Northern Wastes]].
document_data.Related Languages: The [[Wu-haltai language]], the native tongue of the [[Wu-haltai]], had many points in common with Ogre Magi. These similarities likely arose from the proximity of ogre tribes within the [[Ama Basin]] region of the Northern Wastes.

Dictionary.Unknown Words: Ogre Magi included a word for "[[dragon]]s".What exactly this word is was never stated within the cited text.
